description:
This two-person collapsible cookset is great for saving space in your pack while maintaining functionality. The kettle has a durable and efficient aluminum base and is big enough to make 2 dehydrated meals. When you're done your meal, the mugs and kettle collapse down and nest together.

  • Food-grade silicone doesn’t transfer taste, resists high heat, and is easy to clean
  • Kettle has a hard anodized T6 aluminum base that transfers heat efficiently and resists sticking
  • Nylon ring on mugs gives structure for easy drinking
  • Mugs are microwave and dishwasher safe. Kettle is not
  • Set includes 1.3L kettle, kettle lid and 2 mugs
  • Mugs and kettle nest together with collapsed dimension of 15 x 3.5cm
name: Sea To Summit XSet 11 Cookset
